properties.name: cryptoSettings.password
properties.description: Sets the password to be used.

properties.name: cryptoSettings.algorithm
properties.description: Sets the algorithm to be used for encryption (MD2, MD5, SHA, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512, PBEWITHMD5ANDDES, PBEWITHMD5ANDTRIPLEDES, PBEWITHSHA1ANDDESEDE, PBEWITHSHA1ANDRC2_40).

properties.name: cryptoSettings.obtentionIterations
properties.description: Set the number of hashing iterations applied to obtain the encryption key.

properties.name: cryptoSettings.outputType
properties.description: Sets the the form in which String output will be encoded. Use only 'base64' or 'hexadecimal'.
